introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Xoc Dia or Shake the Plate is a traditional game from Vietnam that has existed since 1909. This game is quite similar to Oglok, as it uses a similar method of play involving a bowl. You simply need to guess the outcome of the four buttons inside the bowl.

rules.title: Rules
steps: The game uses one bowl and four buttons with two sides colored red and white.
The game begins when the dealer opens the betting period.
Now, you must place your bet on the provided betting panel and click the submit button.
After the betting period ends, the dealer will shake the bowl to determine the result for that round.

The result is either red or white for each button. If the buttons are not clearly positioned or fall incorrectly, a 'no game' status will occur, and the dealer will shake the bowl again until the result is clear.

placing-a-bet.title: Placing a Bet
placing-a-bet.name: Name
placing-a-bet.threeWhite: Bet on 3 white buttons and 1 red button
placing-a-bet.threeRed: Bet on 3 red buttons and 1 white button

threeWhite.title: Bet on 3 white buttons + 1 red button
threeWhite.winning-conditions: The result is one of the 2 adjacent numbers you placed your bet on

allRed.title: Bet on 4 red buttons
allRed.winning-conditions: The result is one of the 4 adjacent numbers you placed your bet on

threeRed.title: Bet on 1 white button + 3 red buttons
threeRed.winning-conditions: The result is one of the 4 adjacent numbers you placed your bet on

odd.title: Odd Bet (50-50)
odd.winning-conditions: The result is an odd number

small.title: Small Bet (50-50)
small.winning-conditions: The result is a number between 1 and 3

big.title: Big Bet (50-50)
big.winning-conditions: The result is either 4 Red or 1 White + 3 Red

even.title: Even Bet (50-50)
even.winning-conditions: The result is either 4 Red, 2 White + 2 Red, or 4 Red
